description: GemBox.Spreadsheet is a .NET component that enables developers to read, write, convert and print spreadsheet files (XLSX, XLS, ODS, CSV, HTML, PDF or XPS) from their .NET applications using one simple API.
releaseNotes:
- Fixed issue with cells exceeding the MS Excel limit of 32767 characters.
- Fixed issue with sheet's header/footer rendering.
- Fixed issue with rendering merged cells.
- Added support for cell reference which includes sheet index.
- Added support for System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage in Save methods of ExcelFile and FormattedExcelDrawing.
- Added support for SaveOptions.ContentType.
- Fixed issues when reading some XLSX files (invalid zoom values are now skipped, sheet name is correctly encoded/decoded as XML escaped string).
- Fixed issue with cell indent when rendering.
- Fixed issue with formulas not being calculated when XLSX is opened in LibreOffice Calc.
- Added support for reading and writing line breaks in HTML cells.
summary: GemBox.Spreadsheet is a .NET component for reading and writing spreadsheet files (XLSX, XLS, CSV, ODS, HTML, PDF and XPS).
